subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Currency Swap edged the long shot Trinniberg by three-quarters of a length in the $250,000 Hopeful Stakes for 2-year-olds on the final day of the Saratoga Race Course meeting.
snippet: Currency Swap edged the long shot Trinniberg by three-quarters of a length in the $250,000 Hopeful Stakes for 2-year-olds on the final day of the Saratoga Race Course meeting.
